page.title: 14SHOP SURVEY
page.content: Most people who shop in Eynsham live in Eynsham.We found out that most people went to the bakery for their dinner.The main shops in Eynsham are LONDIS,POST OFFICE,BIGGERS,KIDSTUFF,CO-OP,SPAR, PIMMS,JANTYS,EVERLEY STORES,BIKE SHOP, OFF LICENCE,D.I.Y,CHINESE TAKE-AWAY, GLORIAS(HAIR-DRESSERS),STYLE AND ELEGANCE(HAIR-DRESSERS), HOLE-IN-THE-WALL,JENS,THE HALIFAX BUILDING SOCIETY,FISH AND CHIP SHOP,OFF-LICENCE AND GROCERS.Most people go to Oxford once a month for clothes and shoes.They go to Witney once a week for food.People would like to see a shoe-shop in Eynsham.
